+++ SUMMARY

  * HEAT GUN 1500 W , 5200 BTU, WITH A FITTING THAT REFLECTS THE HEAT

  THIS WOULD SOLVE THE PROBLEM OF SOLDERING WATER PIPE ELECTRICALLY, WITHOUT GAS,
  OR COMBUSTION.
